Uses of ClickSensor in edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors
 

Subclasses of ClickSensor in edu.washington.cs.touchfreelibrary.sensors
 class AccelerometerClickSensor
          Class AccelerometerClickSensor looks for sudden perturbations in the z-axis of the accelerometer to detect clicks.
 class CameraGestureSensor
          CameraGestureSensor takes input data from the camera and uses that to sense four gesture commands: up, down, left, and right.
 class MicrophoneClickSensor
          Listen for amplitude spikes coming from the microphone to detect clips.
